SNSD (Girls’ Generation) consists of Taeyeon, Yuri, Hyoyeon, Sunny, Yoona, Tiffany, Sooyoung, and Seohyun. Tiffany, Sooyoung, and Seohyun left S.M. Entertainment on 9 October 2017 but for now, their departure from SNSD wasn’t confirmed. Jessica left the group in 2014. SNSD debuted in 2007, under S.M. Entertainment. 


Girls’ Generation Fandom Name: S♥NE (So-One)
